snippet: Former New Orleans Saints player Will Smith was shot and killed in a case of road rage by a man who had rear-ended his car, police said Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Former New Orleans Saints player Will Smith was shot and killed in a case of road rage by a man who had rear-ended his car, police said Sunday.

headline.main: Police: Ex-Saint Will Smith Gunned Down in Case of Road Rage
headline.print_headline: Police: Ex-Saint Will Smith Gunned Down in Case of Road Rage
